text: Elpídio Pereira Silva Filho (born 19 July 1975), known as Silva, is a Brazilian retired footballer who played as a striker. ==Club statistics== Club performance Club performance Club performance League League Season Club League Apps Goals Brazil Brazil Brazil League League 1997 Atlético Mineiro Série A Japan Japan Japan League League 1997 Kashiwa Reysol J1 League 12 8 1998 10 2 Portugal Portugal Portugal League League 1998–99 Braga Primeira Liga 32 16 1999–00 25 5 2000–01 Boavista Primeira Liga 21 10 2001–02 27 8 2002–03 30 10 2003–04 Sporting Primeira Liga 27 5 2004–05 Vitória Guimarães Primeira Liga 23 7 2005–06 Sporting Primeira Liga 1 0 England England England League League 2005–06 Derby County Championship 0 0 Brazil Brazil Brazil League League 2006 Corinthians Alagoano Korea Republic Korea Republic Korea Republic League League 2006 Suwon Samsung Bluewings K-League 11 1 Country Brazil Brazil Country Japan Japan 22 10 Country Portugal Portugal 186 61 Country England England 0 0 Country Korea Republic Korea Republic 11 1 Total Total Total 219 72 ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1975 births Category:Living people Category:Derby County F.C. players Category:Footballers from Paraíba Category:Association football forwards Category:J1 League players Category:Kashiwa Reysol players
